de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib

Class ThreadWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.util.List<double[]>,java.lang.Object>
      • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.ThreadWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.util.List<double[]>>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.util.List<double[]>>, java.util.EventListener

    public class ThreadWrapper
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.util.List<double[]>,java.lang.Object>
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Threadwrapper extends Swingworker and thus is used to instantiate a feature descriptor and calculate its results for a given image. There is no limit on how many Threadwrappers may work at a time, and using it will prevent the GUI from freezing. A PropertyChangeListener can be used to track the status of the computation, the values range from 0 to 100.
